DOC.brief_summary: This is a prospective study to determine the incidence, morbidity, mortality and predisposing factors for the reactivation of hepatitis B virus replication during direct anti-HCV treatment of HCV/HBV co-infection patients.
DOC.brief_title: DAAs Treatment for Chronic HCV/HBV Co-infection Patients(DASCO)
DOC.detailed_description: Patients who receive direct-acting anti-HCV treatment will be prospectively studied during 2-year period. All patients have HCV/HBV co-infection. The inclusion/exclusion criteria and the follow up plan will be listed in following part.
